name: Praecantatio
description:
You're a mage... Well, not any mage!

In Praecantatio you're a mage with a cautious task to become the most powerful mage ever seen, but to become so, you have to explore ancient mage recordings, study and decipher their lives, with the purpose to obtain and master magic types.
